title: Login not working
description: User cannot log in with correct credentials on the web app.

title: Payment gateway error
description: Stripe payments are failing with error code 402.

title: Slow loading dashboard
description: Dashboard takes more than 10 seconds to load.

title: Email notifications not sent
description: Customers are not receiving signup confirmation emails.

title: UI bug on mobile
description: Navigation bar overlaps with header on iPhone devices.

title: Search not returning results
description: Search feature returns empty results even when items exist.

title: Broken link on homepage
description: The 'Contact Us' link on homepage leads to 404.

title: App crashes on Android
description: Android app crashes on launch for version 12 users.

title: Report export failing
description: Exporting reports to CSV throws server error 500.

title: Forgot password not working
description: Reset password link is not being sent to user emails.

title: Profile picture upload issue
description: Uploading profile pictures results in corrupted files.

title: Subscription renewal failed
description: Auto-renewal of subscription not charging customers.

title: Chat support offline
description: Live chat widget not connecting to support agents.

title: Invoice not generated
description: Monthly invoice not generated for premium customers.
